verses.verse: Now Joshua<WH3091> was old<WH2204> and stricken<WH935> in years;<WH3117> and the LORD<WH3068> said<WH559> unto<WH413> him, Thou<WH859> art old<WH2204> and stricken<WH935> in years,<WH3117> and there remaineth<WH7604> yet very<WH3966> much<WH7235> land<WH776> to be possessed.<WH3423>
This <WH2063> is the land<WH776> that yet remaineth:<WH7604> all<WH3605> the borders<WH1552> of the Philistines,<WH6430> and all<WH3605> Geshuri,<WH1651>

From <WH4480> Sihor,<WH7883> which<WH834> is before<WH5921> <WH6440> Egypt,<WH4714> even unto<WH5704> the borders<WH1366> of Ekron<WH6138> northward,<WH6828> which is counted<WH2803> to the Canaanite:<WH3669> five<WH2568> lords<WH5633> of the Philistines;<WH6430> the Gazathites,<WH5841> and the Ashdothites,<WH796> the Eshkalonites,<WH832> the Gittites,<WH1663> and the Ekronites;<WH6139> also the Avites: <WH5757>

From the south,<WH4480> <WH8486> all<WH3605> the land<WH776> of the Canaanites,<WH3669> and Mearah<WH4632> that<WH834> is beside the Sidonians,<WH6722> unto<WH5704> Aphek,<WH663> to<WH5704> the borders<WH1366> of the Amorites: <WH567>

And the land<WH776> of the Giblites,<WH1382> and all<WH3605> Lebanon,<WH3844> toward the sunrising,<WH4217> <WH8121> from Baal-gad<WH4480> <WH1171> under<WH8478> mount<WH2022> Hermon<WH2768> unto<WH5704> the entering<WH935> into Hamath.<WH2574>

All <WH3605> the inhabitants<WH3427> of the hill country<WH2022> from<WH4480> Lebanon<WH3844> unto<WH5704> Misrephoth-maim,<WH4956> and all<WH3605> the Sidonians,<WH6722> them will I<WH595> drive out<WH3423> from before<WH4480> <WH6440> the children<WH1121> of Israel:<WH3478> only<WH7535> divide thou it by lot<WH5307> unto the Israelites<WH3478> for an inheritance,<WH5159> as<WH834> I have commanded<WH6680> thee.
Now <WH6258> therefore divide<WH2505> <WH853> this<WH2063> land<WH776> for an inheritance<WH5159> unto the nine<WH8672> tribes,<WH7626> and the half<WH2677> tribe<WH7626> of Manasseh,<WH4519>

With <WH5973> whom the Reubenites<WH7206> and the Gadites<WH1425> have received<WH3947> their inheritance,<WH5159> which<WH834> Moses<WH4872> gave<WH5414> them, beyond<WH5676> Jordan<WH3383> eastward,<WH4217> even as<WH834> Moses<WH4872> the servant<WH5650> of the LORD<WH3068> gave<WH5414> them;

From Aroer,<WH4480> <WH6177> that<WH834> is upon<WH5921> the bank<WH8193> of the river<WH5158> Arnon,<WH769> and the city<WH5892> that<WH834> is in the midst<WH8432> of the river,<WH5158> and all<WH3605> the plain<WH4334> of Medeba<WH4311> unto<WH5704> Dibon;<WH1769>

And all<WH3605> the cities<WH5892> of Sihon<WH5511> king<WH4428> of the Amorites,<WH567> which<WH834> reigned<WH4427> in Heshbon,<WH2809> unto<WH5704> the border<WH1366> of the children<WH1121> of Ammon;<WH5983>

And Gilead,<WH1568> and the border<WH1366> of the Geshurites<WH1651> and Maachathites,<WH4602> and all<WH3605> mount<WH2022> Hermon,<WH2768> and all<WH3605> Bashan<WH1316> unto<WH5704> Salcah;<WH5548>

All <WH3605> the kingdom<WH4468> of Og<WH5747> in Bashan,<WH1316> which<WH834> reigned<WH4427> in Ashtaroth<WH6252> and in Edrei,<WH154> who<WH1931> remained<WH7604> of the remnant<WH4480> <WH3499> of the giants:<WH7497> for these did Moses<WH4872> smite,<WH5221> and cast them out.<WH3423>

Nevertheless the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> expelled<WH3423> not<WH3808> <WH853> the Geshurites,<WH1651> nor the Maachathites:<WH4602> but the Geshurites<WH1650> and the Maachathites<WH4601> dwell<WH3427> among<WH7130> the Israelites<WH3478> until<WH5704> this<WH2088> day.<WH3117>

Only <WH7535> unto the tribe<WH7626> of Levi<WH3878> he gave<WH5414> none<WH3808> inheritance;<WH5159> the sacrifices of the LORD God of Israel made by fire<WH801> <WH3068> <WH430> <WH3478> are their inheritance,<WH5159> as<WH834> he said<WH1696> unto them.
And Moses<WH4872> gave<WH5414> unto the tribe<WH4294> of the children<WH1121> of Reuben<WH7205> inheritance according to their families.<WH4940>

And their coast<WH1366> was<WH1961> from Aroer,<WH4480> <WH6177> that<WH834> is on<WH5921> the bank<WH8193> of the river<WH5158> Arnon,<WH769> and the city<WH5892> that<WH834> is in the midst<WH8432> of the river,<WH5158> and all<WH3605> the plain<WH4334> by<WH5921> Medeba;<WH4311>
Heshbon, <WH2809> and all<WH3605> her cities<WH5892> that<WH834> are in the plain;<WH4334> Dibon,<WH1769> and Bamoth-baal,<WH1120> and Beth-baal-meon,<WH1010>
And Jahazah,<WH3096> and Kedemoth,<WH6932> and Mephaath,<WH4158>
And Kirjathaim,<WH7156> and Sibmah,<WH7643> and Zareth-shahar<WH6890> in the mount<WH2022> of the valley,<WH6010>
And Beth-peor,<WH1047> and Ashdoth-pisgah,<WH798> and Beth-jeshimoth,<WH1020>

And all<WH3605> the cities<WH5892> of the plain,<WH4334> and all<WH3605> the kingdom<WH4468> of Sihon<WH5511> king<WH4428> of the Amorites,<WH567> which<WH834> reigned<WH4427> in Heshbon,<WH2809> whom<WH834> Moses<WH4872> smote<WH5221> with<WH854> the princes<WH5387> of Midian,<WH4080> <WH853> Evi,<WH189> and Rekem,<WH7552> and Zur,<WH6698> and Hur,<WH2354> and Reba,<WH7254> which were dukes<WH5257> of Sihon,<WH5511> dwelling<WH3427> in the country.<WH776>

Balaam <WH1109> also the son<WH1121> of Beor,<WH1160> the soothsayer,<WH7080> did the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> slay<WH2026> with the sword<WH2719> among<WH413> them that were slain<WH2491> by them.

And the border<WH1366> of the children<WH1121> of Reuben<WH7205> was<WH1961> Jordan,<WH3383> and the border<WH1366> thereof. This<WH2063> was the inheritance<WH5159> of the children<WH1121> of Reuben<WH7205> after their families,<WH4940> the cities<WH5892> and the villages<WH2691> thereof.
And Moses<WH4872> gave<WH5414> inheritance unto the tribe<WH4294> of Gad,<WH1410> even unto the children<WH1121> of Gad<WH1410> according to their families.<WH4940>

And their coast<WH1366> was<WH1961> Jazer,<WH3270> and all<WH3605> the cities<WH5892> of Gilead,<WH1568> and half<WH2677> the land<WH776> of the children<WH1121> of Ammon,<WH5983> unto<WH5704> Aroer<WH6177> that<WH834> is before<WH5921> <WH6440> Rabbah;<WH7237>
And from Heshbon<WH4480> <WH2809> unto<WH5704> Ramath-mizpeh,<WH7434> and Betonim;<WH993> and from Mahanaim<WH4480> <WH4266> unto<WH5704> the border<WH1366> of Debir;<WH1688>

And in the valley,<WH6010> Beth-aram,<WH1027> and Beth-nimrah,<WH1039> and Succoth,<WH5523> and Zaphon,<WH6829> the rest<WH3499> of the kingdom<WH4480> <WH4468> of Sihon<WH5511> king<WH4428> of Heshbon,<WH2809> Jordan<WH3383> and his border,<WH1366> even unto<WH5704> the edge<WH7097> of the sea<WH3220> of Chinnereth<WH3672> on the other side<WH5676> Jordan<WH3383> eastward.<WH4217>
This <WH2063> is the inheritance<WH5159> of the children<WH1121> of Gad<WH1410> after their families,<WH4940> the cities,<WH5892> and their villages.<WH2691>

And Moses<WH4872> gave<WH5414> inheritance unto the half<WH2677> tribe<WH7626> of Manasseh:<WH4519> and this was<WH1961> the possession of the half<WH2677> tribe<WH4294> of the children<WH1121> of Manasseh<WH4519> by their families.<WH4940>

And their coast<WH1366> was<WH1961> from Mahanaim,<WH4480> <WH4266> all<WH3605> Bashan,<WH1316> all<WH3605> the kingdom<WH4468> of Og<WH5747> king<WH4428> of Bashan,<WH1316> and all<WH3605> the towns<WH2333> of Jair,<WH2971> which<WH834> are in Bashan,<WH1316> threescore<WH8346> cities: <WH5892>

And half<WH2677> Gilead,<WH1568> and Ashtaroth,<WH6252> and Edrei,<WH154> cities<WH5892> of the kingdom<WH4468> of Og<WH5747> in Bashan,<WH1316> were pertaining unto the children<WH1121> of Machir<WH4353> the son<WH1121> of Manasseh,<WH4519> even to the one half<WH2677> of the children<WH1121> of Machir<WH4353> by their families.<WH4940>

These <WH428> are the countries which<WH834> Moses<WH4872> did distribute for inheritance<WH5157> in the plains<WH6160> of Moab,<WH4124> on the other side<WH4480> <WH5676> Jordan,<WH3383> by Jericho,<WH3405> eastward.<WH4217>

But unto the tribe<WH7626> of Levi<WH3878> Moses<WH4872> gave<WH5414> not<WH3808> any inheritance:<WH5159> the LORD<WH3068> God<WH430> of Israel<WH3478> was their inheritance,<WH5159> as<WH834> he said<WH1696> unto them.
